newsitem.title: USA: Sonus stake held by California group.
newsitem.headline: Sonus stake held by California group.

text.p: A group led by West Highland Capital Inc, located in Greenbrae, Calif., said Monday it holds a 5.6 percent stake in Sonus Pharmaceuticals Inc, or 477,100 common shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the purchase of 70,000 shares between December 16 and December 26 at prices ranging from $22.50 to $28.1250 per share.
The group holds the stake for investment purposes.
Sonus, of Bothell, Wash., develops proprietary contrast agents for use in ultrasound imaging.
